pros: Steamer has a back-up reservoir to catch residual moisture from opening
Also has a 60-minute timer to keep you on track, especially in salons with customers
cons: No temperature fine-tuning available other than two power levels

customer_reviews.title: Why is this steamer dripping?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer and it arrived 2 days after placing the order. Which was impressive. However I just used it and it's leaking and making a gurgling noise from the hood. I'm not impressed. I watched the YouTube tutorial and followed the instructions to a tee and we assembled it exactly as illustrated from the operation manual. Why is it dripping from the under base all over my salon floor? Also what is the black knob for? The instructions is really not helpful. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelwarrior

customer_reviews.title: ... on 02/01/16 and received it on 02/05/2016 it was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on 02/01/16 and received it on 02/05/2016 it was easy to assemble, but when I tried it out I was very disappointed in this product. The steam only comes out in the front, and my hair is extremely wet in the front and extremely dry in the back of my head. What a disappointment. I contacted the company immediately but have yet to get a call back. Don't bother to purchase this one, garbage. RPatrick-Ohio
customer_reviews.author: Renee,Oh

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works great when the water is not pouring out if the bottom. Random times it just spills the whole holding canister. Other times the water holds and it works fantastic. Unpredictable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT STARTED LEAKING FROM INSIDE THE UNIT ABOUT 30 DAYS OF INSTALLATION. BY THE TIME I GOT TO TELL AMAZON ABOUT NEEDING TO RETURN ON DAY 32, I WAS OUTSIDE OF RETURN WINDOW. I BOUGHT 2 UNITS AND BOTH ARE LEAKING. SO I WASTED MY MONEY. WILL NOT BE PURCHASING AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty steamer
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice heavy duty steamer, unlike some others I have purchased. I had a hard time getting the bottom screw all the way in the bottom piece, so it's a bit wobbly. The hood doesn't come down easy, so I struggle getting clients under all the way
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: Top Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed. The steamer works, but it seems a little top heavy. I continuously have to tighten the base and pole to make sure it doesn’t tip over. One of the wheels came off at the bottom and I had to tighten the bolt on that. I expected I bit more stability.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi A.

customer_reviews.title: Began to leak after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Began leaking after a few months. I have tried numerous brands of steamers. They all seem to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: william c

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: When I first receieved the steamer it worked great! A little drippage from the hood to your forehead, it was warm/hot but bearable. About 2 months later I went to fill the water in the bottle and place it in the machine and all the water came pouring out. Not sure why that happened so I reached out to customer service anout a week ago and still no response. Hoping that they reach back out to me that way they could help me either fix the problem or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. I’ve always used one for about 20 years. They’ve lasted about 7 years apiece, so that’s a good return on the investment. It’s added to my income by reducing processing time with color. They improve condition of all hair types. They don’t take up space. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TWilson

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I may have to send this back. The hole in the legs is not wide enough making it impossible to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Yemisi P.

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: Truly love my steamer use it once a week and I think its great. Love it wayyyyy better than the heating caps

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STEAMER
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the steamer was built easy to use

customer_reviews.title: best steamer I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I love my steamer for the salon.. my clients love it as well.. very efficient!
customer_reviews.author: SassyshopperT

customer_reviews.title: You may not get all your Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works fine but it didn’t come with the drain cup! So now it leaks and i have to keep a town on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This item caught on fire today with my client underneath it!!!! A terrible burning smell and a spark and it caught fire! I couldn’t believe it and my return window is closed so we are stuck with a non working processor.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Payne

customer_reviews.title: This is a good item for the price.  Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The hinge on the cap was the primary feature that we liked. It is more solid and has not been a failure point on this unit vs others in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: LKS Salons, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great home hair care!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to use and set up. The height adjustment is manageable if you use on someone else but ackward if you try to use alone with having to get up and adjust through trial and error and seat chair height. I would like better if the steam bar went 3/4 or all around the whole dome instead of just in the back. Still worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JRenee

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Processes hair in half the time, leaves it soft and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: BillieLynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July. Broken by November. The 2nd heating switch cracked, than is sparked and started to smolder. This isn’t the first 2nd heating switch to do this to me this year. Bad batch if you ask me.
